fast-flip.mirror-horizontal-hint: Horizontally mirrors the selected tile or token
fast-flip.mirror-vertical-hint: Vertically mirrors the selected tile or token
fast-flip.toggle-afk-hint: Toggles the AFK status of the selected tokens
fast-flip.show-mirror-buttons-hint: Show or hide the mirror buttons on the token HUD
fast-flip.show-toggle-afk-hint: Show or hide the AFK toggle button on the token HUD
fast-flip.allow-afk-toggle-hint: Allow the AFK status to be toggled for player owned tokens
fast-flip.afk-overlay-icon-path-hint: Path to the image to use for the AFK status indicator on tokens
fast-flip.show-afk-status-in-chat-hint: Send a chat message whenever a player's AFK status changes
